page.title: 04EDUCATION-SCHOOL LIFE
page.content:
THE JUNIOR SCHOOL EXPERIENCE OF CLAIRE DEGUILE AGED TWELVE.
AT MY JUNIOR SCHOOL WE HAD FOUR HOUSES,NORMANS,SAXONS,ROMANS,AND DANES.WE WERE ALL PUT INTO HOUSES IN THE FIRST YEAR.THE SCHOOL WAS VERY SMALL AND EVERYBODY KNEW EVERYBODY REALLY WELL.WE HAD A DAY WHERE SOME FOURTH YEAR GIRLS AND BOYS WERE ELECTED TO GO OUT OF THE ROOM,WHILE THE OTHERS VOTED TO SEE WHO WOULD BECOME HOUSE AND SPORTS CAPTAINS OF NORMANS.LAST TERM BEFORE I LEFT,IT WAS OUR TURN,AND LEIGH-ANN SCOTT,KERRI DEVALL AND MYSELF WERE NOMINATED.I WAS LUCKY AND WAS VOTED THE CAPTAIN OF THE HOUSE.THIS WAS A VERY IMPORTANT JOB FOR ME,AND I WAS VERY BUSY AS A RESULT OF IT,ESPECIALLY HELPING THE SPORTS CAPTAIN ON SPORTS DAY.UNFORTUNATELY, NORMANS ONLY CAME SECOND.
